wmndsMsgHelpProps.name: contentText
wmndsMsgHelpProps.description: Required. The text that displays in the help message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentHTML, this option is not required and is ignored.

wmndsMsgHelpProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsMsgHelpProps.description: Required. The HTML to use within the help message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentHTML, contentText is not required and is ignored.

wmndsMsgHelpProps.name: dismissable
wmndsMsgHelpProps.description: If dismissable is set to true, the component will display a close icon. Defaults to true
